casebody.data:
Cleveland Bar Association v. Roddy.

[Cite as Cleveland Bar Assn. v. Roddy (1989), 43 Ohio St. 3d 86.]

(No. D.D. 88-18 Submitted March 14, 1989 Decided May 17, 1989.) *87Spangenberg, Shibley, Traei & Lancione, Robert A. Marais, Curran & Associates and Thomas P. Curran, Donahue & Scanlon and Charles B. Donahue II, for relator. John J. Connors, Jr., for respondent. Per Curiam.

We concur with the board’s findings and recommendations. Respondent is hereby suspended from the practice of law in Ohio for one year. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
